0.dialouge: It appears to be a pamphlet someone posted here.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge: After years of scientific research and development it has become overwhelming clear that the earth is round.

2.dialouge:
Despite this, those at the top hide the truth for their own nefarious ends.~
All the while, many others refuse open their eyes.

3.dialouge:
Come join the Globe Earth Society and learn the truth!~
Meet like minded individuals,~ engage in intellectual conversations,~ and hangout!

4.dialouge: Learn more at your local Globe Earth Convention!

5.dialouge: -Globe Earth Society,~ we have members all across the pillar.

0.dialouge: It appears to be some sort of advertisement.
0.speaker: Klay

1.dialouge:
Dear fellow globe earthers.~
Spreading the truth can be a long and tedious experience!

2.dialouge: That's why we, at the Globe Earth Society, are now proudly announcing our new Globe Earth T-Shirts.

3.dialouge: For only $99.99 you can now spread the truth without the bothersome use of words!!!

4.dialouge: Visit our website at www.GlobeEarthSociety.flat to order your shirt before supplies run out!

5.dialouge: -Globe Earth Society,~ we have members all across the pillar.
